languages.text: "Я бы мог решить, что речь об эхо прошлого или призраке грядущего, но это не так. Колдовство {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} соединяет временные промежутки, нарушает принятый порядок и ток событий. Мне удалось услышать отголосок того, кто стоит за культом. Я не в первый раз сталкиваюсь с демонами, {name}, но это? Подобного средоточия зла и скверны я не мог себе и представить. {name}... я уверен, что за культом Последнего восхода стоит один из Великих демонов. Страшись того дня, когда он найдет способ лично явиться в этот мир".

traits.locale_text: "Я бы мог решить, что речь об эхо прошлого или призраке грядущего, но это не так. Колдовство {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} соединяет временные промежутки, нарушает принятый порядок и ток событий. Мне удалось услышать отголосок того, кто стоит за Культом. Я не в первый раз сталкиваюсь с демонами, {name}, но это? Подобного средоточия зла и скверны я не мог себе и представить. {name}... я уверен, что за Культом Последнего восхода стоит один из Великих демонов. Страшись того дня, когда он найдет способ лично явиться в этот мир".

languages.text: "I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}... I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."
languages.original_text: "Я бы мог решить, что речь об эхо прошлого или призраке грядущего, но это не так. Колдовство {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} соединяет временные промежутки, нарушает принятый порядок и ток событий. Мне удалось услышать отголосок того, кто стоит за культом. Я не в первый раз сталкиваюсь с демонами, {name}, но это? Подобного средоточия зла и скверны я не мог себе и представить. {name}... я уверен, что за культом Последнего восхода стоит один из Великих демонов. Страшись того дня, когда он найдет способ лично явиться в этот мир".

traits.locale_text: "I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. Warp sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the Cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}… I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."

"I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. Warp sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the Cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}… I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."

"I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the Cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}... I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."

languages.text: “我可以把看到的一切当做是过去的回声或未来的幻景，但事实并非如此。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的巫术可以将不断延伸的时间连接在一起，扰乱一切事情原本的顺序与流程。当时，我听到了邪教幕后那些声音的共鸣。这并不是我第一次面对恶魔，{name}，可像那样的恶魔？……我根本无法想象，邪恶与腐化会像那样凝结在一起。{name}……我很确信，终末黎明教派的幕后黑手，是某位高阶恶魔。如果某一天，那只高阶恶魔找到了在物质世界显形的办法，那你务必要当心。”
languages.original_text: "I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}... I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."

traits.locale_text: “我可以把看到的一切当做是过去的回声或未来的幻景，但事实并非如此。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的巫术可以将不断延伸的时间连接在一起，扰乱一切事情原本的顺序与流程。当时，我听到了邪教幕后那些声音的共鸣。这并不是我第一次面对恶魔，{name}，可像那样的恶魔？……我根本无法想象，邪恶与腐化会像那样凝结在一起。{name}……我很确信，终末黎明教派的幕后黑手，是某位高阶恶魔。如果某一天，那只高阶恶魔找到了在物质世界显形的办法，那你务必要当心。”

languages.original_text: "I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. Warp sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the Cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, , but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. ... I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."

languages.text: «Podría considerarlo un eco del pasado o un espectro del futuro, pero no lo es. La hechicería de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} une distintos puntos en el tiempo, violando la secuencia y el flujo natural de los acontecimientos. Oí una resonancia de la persona que controla el Culto. Me he enfrentado a daemons en más de una ocasión, {name}, pero ¿esto? No podría imaginar tal concentración de maldad y corrupción. {name}... estoy convencido de que uno de los daemon mayores está detrás del Culto del Amanecer Final. Tema el día en que encuentre la forma de materializarse en este mundo».
languages.original_text: "I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}... I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."

traits.locale_text: «Podría considerarlo un eco del pasado o un espectro del futuro, pero no lo es. La hechicería de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} une distintos puntos en el tiempo, violando la secuencia y el flujo natural de los acontecimientos. Oí una resonancia de la persona que controla el Culto. Me he enfrentado a daemons en más de una ocasión, {name}, pero ¿esto? No podría imaginar tal concentración de maldad y corrupción. {name}... estoy convencido de que uno de los daemon mayores está detrás del Culto del Amanecer Final. Tema el día en que encuentre la forma de materializarse en este mundo».

languages.text: 「それは過去からのこだまや未来の亡霊ととらえることもできるが、そうではないのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}の魔術は、時間の長さをつなぎ合わせ、受け入れられている出来事の順序や流れを侵すのだ。私は教団の背後にいる人物の共鳴を聞いた。ディーモンと対峙したことは一度や二度ではないのだ、{name}。だが、これほどの邪悪と腐敗の集中は想像もできなかった。{name}…私は、グレーターディーモンの1体が最後の夜明け教団の背後にいると確信している。そのディーモンが、この世界に姿を現すすべをみつけた時には用心するのだ」
languages.original_text: "I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}... I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."

traits.locale_text: 「それは過去からのこだまや未来の亡霊ととらえることもできるが、そうではないのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}の魔術は、時間の長さをつなぎ合わせ、受け入れられている出来事の順序や流れを侵すのだ。私は教団の背後にいる人物の共鳴を聞いた。ディーモンと対峙したことは一度や二度ではないのだ、{name}。だが、これほどの邪悪と腐敗の集中は想像もできなかった。{name}…私は、グレーターディーモンの1体が最後の夜明け教団の背後にいると確信している。そのディーモンが、この世界に姿を現すすべをみつけた時には用心するのだ」

languages.text: "Ich könnte entscheiden, es als Echo der Vergangenheit oder als Geist der Zukunft zu sehen, doch das ist es nicht. Die Magie des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warps{/g} lässt Zeitabschnitte verschmelzen, sie schändet die allgemein akzeptierte Abfolge von Ereignissen, den Zeitfluss. Ich habe eine Resonanz der Person hinter dem Kult gehört. Ich hatte mehr als einmal mit Dämonen zu tun, {name}, doch dies? Eine solche Konzentration des Bösen und der Verderbtheit hätte ich mir nicht vorstellen können. {name} ... Ich bin überzeugt, dass einer der Großen Dämonen hinter dem Kult der letzten Dämmerung steckt. Fürchtet den Tag, an dem dieser Dämon einen Weg findet, in dieser Welt zu erscheinen."
languages.original_text: "I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}... I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."

traits.locale_text: "Ich könnte entscheiden, es als Echo der Vergangenheit oder als Geist der Zukunft zu sehen, doch das ist es nicht. Die Magie des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warps{/g} lässt Zeitabschnitte verschmelzen, sie schändet die allgemein akzeptierte Abfolge von Ereignissen, den Zeitfluss. Ich habe eine Resonanz der Person hinter dem Kult gehört. Ich hatte mehr als einmal mit Dämonen zu tun, {name}, doch dies? Eine solche Konzentration des Bösen und der Verderbtheit hätte ich mir nicht vorstellen können. {name} ... Ich bin überzeugt, dass einer der Großen Dämonen hinter dem Kult der letzten Dämmerung steckt. Fürchtet den Tag, an dem dieser Dämon einen Weg findet, in dieser Welt zu erscheinen."

languages.text: « Je pourrais me dire qu'il s'agissait simplement d'un écho du passé ou d'un spectre du futur, mais je sais que ce n'est pas le cas. La sorcellerie du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} relie des portions de temps et altère la séquence admise des événements. J'ai perçu une résonance de la personne qui dirige le culte. J'ai affronté des démons plus d'une fois, mais ça ? Jamais je n'aurais imaginé qu'il existait quelque part une telle concentration de malveillance et de corruption. {name}... Je suis convaincu que l'un des démons majeurs se cache derrière le Culte de l'Aube finale. Redoutez le jour où il trouvera le moyen d'apparaître dans ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}... I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."

traits.locale_text: « Je pourrais me dire qu'il s'agissait simplement d'un écho du passé ou d'un spectre du futur, mais je sais que ce n'est pas le cas. La sorcellerie du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} relie des portions de temps et altère la séquence admise des événements. J'ai perçu une résonance de la personne qui dirige le culte. J'ai affronté des démons plus d'une fois, mais ça ? Jamais je n'aurais imaginé qu'il existait quelque part une telle concentration de malveillance et de corruption. {name}... Je suis convaincu que l'un des démons majeurs se cache derrière le Culte de l'Aube finale. Redoutez le jour où il trouvera le moyen d'apparaître dans ce monde. »

languages.text: "Geçmişten bir yankı yahut vesvese diye kestirip atabilirdim ama işin aslı başka. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g} sahirliği, zaman parçalarını birleştirir. Kabul görmüş silsileyi, olay örgüsünü ihlal eder. Tarikatın ardındaki şahsın tınısını işittim. İlk defa iblislerle karşılaşmıyorum ama bu farklıydı {name}. Böylesi yoğun bir kötülüğü, yozluğu hayal bile edemezdim. {name}... Bence Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın ardında Büyük İblislerden biri var. O iblis, bu dünyaya gelmeyi başarırsa vay hâlimize."
languages.original_text: "I could choose to think of it as an echo of the past or a spectre of the future, but that's not it. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sorcery joins stretches of time together, violating the accepted sequence and flow of events. I heard a resonance of the person behind the cult. I've faced daemons more than once before, {name}, but this? I couldn't have imagined such a concentration of evil and corruption. {name}... I am convinced that one of the Greater Daemons is behind the Cult of the Final Dawn. Beware the day when that daemon finds a way to appear in this world."
